item.title: BLURBSMITH Copywriting
item.description:
Need an ad, blurb, or slogan?
I write original, quality, creative copy in whatever turnaround time you make available. Seriously.

I’m available now for writing of any nature.


Other Skills & Services

While words will always be my true love, they’re not my only love.

I code. If you need a website, I build them… responsively, and mobile-first, with emphasise on loading speed.

I configure. Be it WordPress, Wordpress MultiSite, Github Pages, Google App Engine, or Google Apps, I’ve set-up more of each of these than I’ve been on bad first dates.

I analyse. Rarely do the numbers lie and often do the numbers shock. I love to dig into Google Analytics and Google Webmaster Tools to tell you the facts about your website, website traffic, social media scope and SEO statistics.

I optimise. Website performance and usability doesn’t support them. I also have a website performance service: if you have a website, I can make it loads faster. Visit www.loadsfaster.net for more info.

I think critically, and act accordingly. I believe there’s an easier answer to today’s email needs, so I’m building Maily.Pro. Visit www.maily.pro for more info.


CONTACT BLURBSMITH

I might be really busy or I might be really bored. Either way, you should contact me today.
